summary: The diff implements all four requirements for fixing the binder grid layout selection issue. The changes properly integrate user layout preferences into the BinderViewScreen component, hook implementations, and settings dialog. All requirements are addressed with appropriate evidence in the code.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a migration module (backend/migration.mo) that converts layoutPresets from List to Map structure
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly stated as a constraint 'Do not modify the backend schema or main.mo layout management logic', yet the diff includes backend schema changes converting layoutPresets from List.List<Text> to Map.Map<Text, ()> with a migration script
